summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Beach Drive from 63rd Avenue Southwest to the south line of Seashore Park 2nd Addition to West Seattle, by construction of concrete curbs and gutters, and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9978 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
